verses.verse: I exhort <S%G3870><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> of all, <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G4160><s%> petitions, <S%G1162><s%> prayers, <S%G4335><s%> intercessions, <S%G1783><s%> and givings of thanks, <S%G2169><s%> be made <S%G4160><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men: <S%G444><s%>

for <S%G5228><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> who are <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> high places; <S%G5247><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we may lead <S%G1236><s%> a tranquil <S%G2263><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> quiet <S%G2263><s%> life <S%G979><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> godliness <S%G2150><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> reverence. <S%G4587><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is good <S%G2570><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> acceptable <S%G587><s%> in the sight of <S%G1799><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Savior; <S%G4990><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> desires <S%G2309><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> people <S%G444><s%> to be saved <S%G4982><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> full knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of the truth. <S%G225><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> there is one <S%G1520><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> mediator <S%G3316><s%> between God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> the man <S%G444><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>
who gave <S%G1325><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> as a ransom <S%G487><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> all; <S%G3956><s%> the testimony <S%G3142><s%> in its own <S%G2398><s%> times; <S%G2540><s%>

to <S%G1519><s%> which <S%G1519><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> was appointed <S%G5087><s%> a preacher <S%G2783><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> (I am telling <S%G3004><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lying <S%G5574><s%>), a teacher <S%G1320><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> truth. <S%G225><s%>

I desire <S%G1014><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that <S%G4336><s%> the men <S%G435><s%> in every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> pray, <S%G4336><s%> lifting up <S%G1869><s%> holy <S%G3741><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> anger <S%G3709><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> doubting. <S%G1261><s%>

In the same way, <S%G5615><s%> that <S%G2885><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> adorn <S%G2885><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> decent <S%G2887><s%> clothing, <S%G2689><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> modesty <S%G127><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> propriety; <S%G4997><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> just with <S%G1722><s%> braided hair, <S%G4117><s%> <S%G2228><s%> gold, <S%G5557><s%> <S%G2228><s%> pearls, <S%G3135><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> expensive <S%G4185><s%> clothing; <S%G2441><s%>
but <S%G235><s%> (which <S%G3739><s%> becomes <S%G4241><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> professing <S%G1861><s%> godliness <S%G2317><s%>) with <S%G1223><s%> good <S%G18><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>
Let <S%G3129><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> quietness <S%G2271><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> subjection. <S%G5292><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I don't <S%G3756><s%> permit <S%G2010><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> to teach, <S%G1321><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> to exercise authority over <S%G831><s%> a man, <S%G435><s%> but <S%G235><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> quietness. <S%G2271><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> Adam <S%G76><s%> was <S%G4111><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> formed, <S%G4111><s%> then <S%G1534><s%> Eve. <S%G2096><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Adam <S%G76><s%> <S%G538><s%> wasn't <S%G3756><s%> deceived, <S%G538><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> the woman, <S%G1135><s%> being deceived, <S%G538><s%> has <S%G1096><s%> fallen into <S%G1722><s%> disobedience; <S%G3847><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> she will be saved <S%G4982><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> her childbearing, <S%G5042><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they continue <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1223><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> <S%G2532><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sanctification <S%G38><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> sobriety. <S%G4997><s%>
